website_summaries.verdict: The Terra-Float Churn’s outdoor performance was able to satisfy individuals. It was appreciated for its lightweight build and excellent comfort. Also, its well-ventilated feel was not left unnoticed by shoe owners. This offering had a restrictive fit, though. All in all, the Teva Terra-Float Churn is a water-friendly hiking shoe that can accompany individuals without sacrificing comfort.
pros: The lightness of the Teva Terra-Float Churn has impressed the majority
Based on a handful of user reviews, this outdoor shoe from Teva provides an excellent level of comfort
Its breathability has delighted a considerable number of wearers
Most users declare that they like the attractive design of the Terra-Float Churn
A few customers rave about the good arch support of this water hiking shoe
The channels or holes in the midsole make a fantastic feature when hiking around the water, comment a few
A couple of verified purchasers state that they appreciate the shoe’s flexibility
cons: A considerable number of owners discover that the Terra-Float Churn’s is too narrow

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Great style but super disappointed about the fit. I’d noticed other reviews about them being too narrow and That’s very true. The shoes are way to narrow and unfortunately you can’t order them wider. I wish you could because I was really looking forward to them. But I’m returning them sadly because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Longson

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like them but elastic digs into feet
customer_reviews.text: I really liked everything about these shoes - they were light weight, hard soled, and easy to get on and off. However, the right and left side of the shoe, by the tongue, dig into my foot to the point where it bothered me when cinched up. If it wasn't for that, I would have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric SF

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst claim to be “waterproof” shoes I’ve ever owned. I just received them, and went to test them out. It wasn’t in the water for more than 30 seconds, and I already felt water seeping through. I’ll be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tevas are great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband only wears Teva shoes and sandals. He loves the fit and comfort. These shoes are lightweight and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie MacAskill

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're a little snug, but working through them anyway. I am a true 11.5 and they're snug w light ankle socks. Super cool water feature where the water runs out of channels underneath my feet, and out of the sides of the shoes' soles. They look great and dried off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Oxen Free

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so narrow they are are painful to wear. I wore them on a short walk and the ridge inside the shoe on the outside below the tongue cuts into your foot. I suspect these are Asian spec sizes (a common trend on Amazon). I owned the predecessor model to these and had great luck, probably hiking a thousand miles up rivers in them before they began to fall apart. Disappointed. Returning these.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot on airplanes, I LOVE these shoes they are light do not make your feet sweat and you can just slide into them like slippers to get out to the security checkpoint and walk to your gate to put them on same as on the plane you can slip them off and again just slide into the instead of trying to contort yourself getting shoes on in an airplane seat. They are also water shoes so they dry fast if you get wet in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Teva makes good products
customer_reviews.text: I like the color selection. The fit was good but not great. There have been other reviewers that stated it is narrow. That is true but I am able to fit into these water shoes.
customer_reviews.author: RSMacca58

customer_reviews.title: Footbed is too hard
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good water show for my jetski use. This can drain water good, but the sole is too hard for me. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Click Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run narrow I need to go up on my usual size to fit.
customer_reviews.author: VEYS

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, comfortable & looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve previously had this model shoe & it has been my go-to for 10 or so years. I couldn’t find it in my home market & was so excited when I finally tracked in down in the US. The new one seems as good as before so I’m extremely satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: perry rabin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but initially stinky with strong rubbery smell.
customer_reviews.text: Stinky, rubbery smell. But, but fit well and husband say they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Two narrow and digs into the food
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow and elastic on top digs in to foot. No good if you looking for a good comfy water shoe like beffore! I will keep it but I will not buy another pair as I did before.
customer_reviews.author: Kotik

customer_reviews.title: Resilient but rigid
customer_reviews.text: Not as cushioned of a feel as I expected from Teva
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hoeger

customer_reviews.title: A quality produce
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. My second pair and I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes too narrow! I have 3 pairs I’ve worn out witch fit great. These I returned! Too bad it “was” a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: shooter

customer_reviews.title: Water Sponge - Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Water Proof is a word reserved for something that is... Water Proof! Simple yeah? This comfortable shoe is a breathable water sieve, that lets water flow into it quickly and soaks into your socks! So you can go the entire day with damp feet. How wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Out Doorsman

product_meta.title: Teva mens Terra Float Churn Terra-float
product_meta.description: Take endless bounds into the sea wearing the water-capable Teva® Terra-Float Churn. Lightweight, breathable upper dries quickly. Lace-up closure with toggle closure for quick adjustments. Lightly-padded tongue and collar support. Floatlite™ midsole provides cushioning on every step. Perforations in the sole allow water to drain and dry quickly. Slip-proof rubber outsole offers reliable traction on wet surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 12 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Take endless bounds into the sea wearing the water-capable Teva® Terra-Float Churn.
Lace-up closure with toggle closure for quick adjustments.

Floatlite™ midsole provides cushioning on every step. Perforations in the sole allow water to drain and dry quickly. Slip-proof rubber outsole offers reliable traction on wet surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 12 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
